articles.title: Eurovision 2023: Sweden's Loreen becomes first woman to win contest twice - Sky News
articles.description: Sweden's Loreen has won the Eurovision contest with her dance-pop anthem Tattoo, making history as the first woman to win the contest twice after first takin...
